testcase.purpose: Validate if sample app spacedodge can be built on android device which is 'arm/x86' architecture

step.step_desc: If com.example.spacedodge exists in apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory, remove it Then run below commands under apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory: On Android: Shared Mode: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge --android-shared Embedded Mode: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge $ cd com.example.spacedodge $ git clone https://github.com/crosswalk-project/crosswalk-samples.git $ mv crosswalk-samples/space-dodge-game/base/* app/ $ crosswalk-app build On Windows: Shared Mode: $ node %crosswalk-app% create com.example.spacedodge --android-shared Embedded Mode: $ node %crosswalk-app% create com.example.spacedodge $ cd com.example.spacedodge $ git clone https://github.com/crosswalk-project/crosswalk-samples.git $ xcopy /s /e /i /y crosswalk-samples\space-dodge-game\base\* app\ $ node %crosswalk-app% build

Shared Mode: Install shared mode spacedodge app on your android device which is "arm" architecture Install shared mode spacedodge app on your android device which is "x86" architecture Embedded Mode: Install arm spacedodge app on your android device which is "arm" architecture Install x86 spacedodge app on your android device which is "x86" architecture
Check icon of spacedodge app in your android device
Launch spacedodge app in your android device
Check the homepage of spacedodge app
step.expected: You can see spacedodge UI on the device

step.step_desc: Uninstall the app when it is running
Install and launch the spacedodge app again. Close spacedodge app via clicking the home button, and kill spacedodge app from Task Manager
Long press the icon of spacedodge app to uninstall it

testcase.purpose: Validate if sample app spacedodge function could work well on android device

description.pre_condition: 1. Make sure the spacedodge webapp is launched on your android device.

step.step_desc: Check every button from spacedodge UI
step.expected: All button and function work well
